project.description: 1. adds host entry in /etc/hosts 2. fetches the list of ip's from hostname file and apply host config to checkmk

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
hostname
rsync -a root@3.22.237.100:/nodename/hostnames /pupmas sleep 2s cat /pupmas/hostnames > /etc/hosts sleep 2s rm -vf /opt/omd/sites/dockmon/etc/check_mk/main.mk sleep 2s echo "all_hosts = [ $(for i in $(cat /pupmas/hostnames| grep puppet | awk '{print $2}'); do echo "\"$i\","; done)" ]"" > /opt/omd/sites/dockmon/etc/check_mk/main.mk sleep 2s chown dockmon:dockmon /opt/omd/sites/dockmon/etc/check_mk/main.mk sleep 2s su -c 'cmk --update-dns-cache' - dockmon sleep 2s su -c 'cmk -I' - dockmon sleep 5s su -c 'cmk -O' - dockmon sleep 5s su -c 'cmk -R' - dockmon
